name: Tanooki Labs
description:
You need more from your technical cofounder than just development. Tanooki Labs combines scalable technology, strong product thinking and the experience of having launched over 150 products to help you bring more to the table.
We know what it’s like to start a successful business and we’ve also taken our lumps. We're at our best when we can get involved early and apply our experience to help entrepreneurs avoid common product and development pitfalls. At Tanooki Labs, we’re committed to helping you grow your business, not just bring you a shiny new app.
READ MORE...
